sentences: Arnold David Lanni (born May 4, 1956) is a Canadian record producer and former member of Frozen Ghost and Sheriff.
Lanni was a founding member of Canadian rock band Sheriff in 1979.
Sheriff members Lanni and Wolf Hassel then formed Frozen Ghost, which existed 1985 to 1993.
In 2000 Lanni was nominated as producer of the year at the Juno Awards.
